content: brunswick beanie ≈ 50g - 90g 100 - 200m dk yarn 4 00mm circular needle 40cm/16 4 00mm double point needles for crown stitch markers tapestry needle sizes s / m / l / xl snuggly and head hugging fits a wide range of sizes unstretched 32 /36 /40 /44cm / 12 5 / 14 /15 5 /17 stretched up to ≈ 46 /50 /56 /61cm / 18 /20 /22 /24 gauge 22 stitches and 30 row to 10cm/4 over stocking stitch using 4 00mm needles instructions using 4 00mm needles cast on 90 /100 /110 /120 sts abbreviations you need to work a stretchy cast on - german k knit twisted cast on or tubular cast on recommended p purl k2tog knit 2 sts together join to work in the round place marker knit wise as if to knit psso pass slipped stitch over work in p1 k1 rib until knitting measures p2sso pass 2 slipped stitches over ≈ 14 /15 /16 /16cm / 5 5 /6 /6 5 /6 5 from cast on sl slip_stitch or length desired longer will be slouchier cdd centred double decrease slip 2 sts knit wise k1 p2sso crown place marker every 18 / 20 / 22 / 24sts german twisted cast on r1 * work in p1 k1 rib until 3 sts before marker https //www youtube com/watch v=af1xpkbbyxs&t cdd sl2 k1 p2sso repeat from * to end total of 10 sts decreased per round tubular cast on https //www youtube com/watch v=5jefvxjfopu r2 work in p1 k1 rib without decreasing repeat r1 & r2 until 20 sts remain last round *k2tog repeat from * to end of round draw yarn through remaining sts and fasten_off total of 10sts remain sew in ends © 2017 riotousassembly sue grandfield 1 brunswick beanie
